verses.verse: To the chief <WH5329> Musician <WH5329> upon Mahalath, <WH4257> Maschil, <WH4905> A Psalm of David. <WH1732> The fool <WH5036> has said <WH559> in his heart, <WH3820> There is no <WH369> God. <WH430> Corrupt <WH7843> are they, and have done abominable <WH8581> iniquity: <WH5766> there is none <WH369> that does <WH6213> good. <WH2896>
God <WH430> looked <WH8259> down from heaven <WH8064> on the children <WH1121> of men, <WH120> to see <WH7200> if there were any that did understand, <WH7919> that did seek <WH1875> God. <WH430>
Every <WH3605> one of them is gone <WH5472> back: <WH5472> they are altogether <WH3162> become <WH444> filthy; <WH444> there is none <WH369> that does <WH6213> good, <WH2896> no, not one. <WH259>
Have the workers <WH6466> of iniquity <WH205> no <WH3808> knowledge? <WH3045> who eat <WH398> up my people <WH5971> as they eat <WH398> bread: <WH3899> they have not called <WH7121> on God. <WH430>

There <WH8033> were they in great fear, <WH6343> where no <WH3808> fear <WH6343> was: for God <WH430> has scattered <WH6340> the bones <WH6106> of him that encamps <WH2583> against you: you have put them to shame, <WH954> because <WH3588> God <WH430> has despised <WH3988> them.

Oh that the salvation <WH3444> of Israel <WH3478> were come out of Zion! <WH6726> When God <WH430> brings <WH7725> back <WH7725> the captivity <WH7622> of his people, <WH5971> Jacob <WH3290> shall rejoice, <WH1523> and Israel <WH3478> shall be glad. <WH8056>
